thread.title: Top 10 Craziest Things we Found Hiding in the Overstock Warehouse and Website
thread.title_full: Top 10 Craziest Things we Found Hiding in the Overstock Warehouse and Website

title: Top 10 Craziest Things we Found Hiding in the Overstock Warehouse and Website
text:
Top 10 Craziest Things we Found Hiding in the Overstock Warehouse and Website Written by: Whalen MacHale 07/17/15 - 11:06 AM EDT NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Overstock is an American online retailer that specializes in selling discounted items to consumers. TheStreet found what treasures hid in the Overstock warehouses outside of Salt Lake City and on its website in search of the craziest things the retailer has to offer. Overstock made headlines this past week about the company's expansion into China and for filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission about possibly issuing a public crypto security that would allow people to trade Overstock shares using bitcoin. But with earnings for Overstock coming on July 23, we wanted to find the craziest items that were behind the company's sales numbers. 
Grey Shark Quilted Cotton Oven Mitt ($8.99) 
We told an intern to try out these mitts and bake us something to go with our coffee. The muffin tops were great, but unfortunately, oven mitts are now circling our office with little sign of backing down. A number of our interns have lost one or more limbs, and one intern with a punctured lung is currently unconscious due to excessive bleeding. We've called the Coast Guard, but they keep telling us the sharks on Wall Street are out of their jurisdiction. More Headlines
